code: import React from"react";import{useExerciseData}from"../../Contexts/ExerciseContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProgressBar=()=>{const{currentLevel,numQuestions}=useExerciseData();const progress=currentLevel/numQuestions*100;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{backgroundColor:"#F0F1F5"},className:"w-full rounded-full h-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-5 rounded-full transition-all duration-300",style:{backgroundColor:"#050D30",width:`${progress===numQuestions-1?progress+1:progress}%`}})});};export default ProgressBar;
